name: Ping Pong Deluxe
description:
Dive into the world of Ping Pong Deluxe and choose from 5 maps and different game modes that will put your skills to the test. During the game, collect valuable keys to unlock new items with which you can personalize your character.


Currently, there are five cool maps that you can play in Ping Pong Deluxe. Each of these maps offers a unique gaming experience and a challenge that will put your ping pong skills to the test.


Show off your skills in the thrilling PvP mode, challenge the computer opponent in Com mode, discover the Power-Up mode with exciting effects or create your very own challenge in Custom mode.


Currently, 32 unique items await you to individualise your player and to customise the map colours. Give your character a personal touch and design the playing fields colours according to your taste.

Become the undisputed table tennis champion!
